entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
